definition: scattered/loose/to come loose/to fall apart/leisurely/powdered medicine
to scatter/to break up (a meeting etc)/to disperse/to disseminate/to dispel/(coll.) to sack
in confusion or disorder/in a confused state of mind/disorder/upheaval/riot/illicit sexual relations/to throw into disorder/to mix up/indiscriminate/random/arbitrary

sentences.english: The desks were littered with fruits which the students had been sketching.
sentences.chinese: 课桌上散乱地放着学生们正在临摹的水果。

sentences.english: A new method for removing redundant points from 3D scattered point sets is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种剔除空间散乱点集中冗余点的新方法。

sentences.english: Design of adornment of some setting wall is too messy, often a presumptuous guest usurps the host's role.
sentences.chinese: 有些背景墙装饰设计过于散乱，往往喧宾夺主。

sentences.english: Clear a little clutter by getting rid of something you don’t need.
sentences.chinese: 通过扔弃不需要的东西来清理散乱的杂物。

sentences.english: The apartment was littered with bone fragments, and human teeth.
sentences.chinese: 这个公寓到处散乱着骨头的碎片和人的牙齿。

sentences.english: Her dark hair waved untidy across her broad forehead.
sentences.chinese: 她的黑发散乱地飘拂在宽阔的脑门子上。

sentences.english: Her hair was loose, and wet with snow and rain.
sentences.chinese: 她散乱的头发湿漉漉地沾满雨雪。

sentences.english: Her clothes spread out on the double bed.
sentences.chinese: 她的衣服散乱地铺满了双人床。

sentences.english: A straggle of crumbling buildings is all that remains of this hill-side village.
sentences.chinese: 一些散乱的摇摇欲坠的建筑便是这山村留下的一切。

sentences.english: Jin Shenglie also when rob, hair scattered away.
sentences.chinese: 金圣烈也在抢夺的时候，头发散乱开了。

sentences.english: Practice mindfulness in your daily life. A mind free of wandering thoughts develops inner strength.
sentences.chinese: 把专心变成一种习惯，心不散乱就有定力。

sentences.english: If the content rambles, so will the users.
sentences.chinese: 如果内容的组织散乱，用户就难以集中注意力。

sentences.english: Her hair was  loose, and wet with snow and rain.
sentences.chinese: 她散乱的头发湿漉漉地沾满雨雪。

sentences.english: Plane scattered data triangulation has a wide application.
sentences.chinese: 平面散乱点三角剖分在实践中有广泛应用。

sentences.english: In our percent academe, the study about "in dubio pro reo" which means no punishment in doubt case is disheveled.
sentences.chinese: 在目前我国的学术界，对于疑罪从无的研究是散乱的。
最殊胜的禅修是不散乱。

definition: disordered and in a mess (idiom); all mixed up and chaotic
to gather/to rake together/to pile up
to draw to oneself/to gather up/to collect/to fold up (an umbrella, wings etc)/to assemble (a party of persons)/to rope in (some people)
